headline.main: The Late Gen. Samuel Stevens--The Cause of his Death.; From the Albany Journal.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tile following particulars in regard to the last illness of SAMUEL, STEVENS, Esq., have been furnished to us by his family physician, Dr. JAMES McNAUGHTON, and we give them publicly, knowing how general is the wish among his numerous friends to know as much as they can about the last hours of one so gifted and so eminent during life:

docs.lead_paragraph: SERMONS FOR THE PEOPLE. By T. H. STOCKTON. Pittsburgh : ENGLISH CO. 1854. It is now about twenty-five years since Rev. THOMAS H. STOCKTON, author of the sermons before us, began to attract public attention as a young man of extraordinary talents.

headline.main: Fashionable Covering for the Head and the Feet.

docs.lead_paragraph: Seldom has it happened that there has been so general an advance of prices for the necessaries of life as we have of late been suffering. Hard Times, whose shadow is never off the hearth of the poor, now darken the halls of those who have been accounted rich, and subdue the usually gay lights that illuminate their parlors.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; AMERICAN INSTITUTE. A Sarcastle Man. How Flour Is. Assault at the Bowery Theatre. The City Register--Inquiry Commenced. Fog on the Bay--Marine Detentions. A Philadelphia Scamp.

docs.lead_paragraph: CAPTAIN CANOT: OR, TWENTY YEARS OF AN AFRICAN SLAVER. Edited by BRANTZ MAYER, New-York : D. APPLLTON Co. When we had read the Captain's adventures half through, we had not a thought that they were true, but with the conclusion of the volume the high color is subdued, and it is hard to believe that the records are not veracious.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Prometheus came into port yesterday, with $1,000,000 in specie, 301 passengers, and an abundance of the tamer sort of news. From California the mining news is neither very good nor very bad. The crops are pretty well reported of. Politics are in all the people's thoughts, and there is no more harmony on the Pacific than on the Atlantic coast.
